site_name: Land Between Park View And Cloister Road
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of water efficiency measures in pursuant to condition 35 of planning application Ref: 224371FUL dated 13/09/2023 for: Redevelopment of the Site including the erection of 6 residential buildings ranging in height from ground +1 to ground + 16 floors to provide a total of 300 new homes (use class C3) (affordable and private), with public and private amenity spaces including roof top gardens and play spaces; servicing; disabled car parking; bike and bin stores; resident gym; concierge and associated spaces. With associated highways works, and landscaping works along Western Avenue.
